DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy + Herceptin HER2 Positive Stage II-III Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This investigator-initiated , Phase II , non-randomized , single-arm , prospective treatment study . The study consist neoadjuvant treatment period ( week 1 20 ) , surgical evaluation period ( week 20 24 ) , post-surgical/follow-up period ( approximately 3 year ) . Subjects treat outpatient basis . Neoadjuvant therapy consist epirubicin + cyclophosphamide give every 2 week four cycle follow three week break . Subjects receive docetaxel every two week four cycle + trastuzumab ( one load dose ) maintenance dose every 2 week 4 treatment .
